meanings.definition: The act or practice of hanging wallpaper.
meanings.sent1: My mom is skilled in paperhanging and transformed our living room with beautiful wallpaper.
meanings.sent2: The paperhanging in the bedroom was done meticulously, with each pattern perfectly aligned.
meanings.sent3: The paperhanging expert made the walls look like they were wearing fancy clothes!
meanings.sent4: Her paperhanging was like painting a picture on the walls, adding color and life to the room.
meanings.sent5: The art of paperhanging requires patience and precision to create stunning wall designs.

meanings.sent1: The paperhanging arrived early in the morning to start working on the new wallpaper.
meanings.sent2: Our neighbor is a talented paperhanging who can make any room look elegant.
meanings.sent3: The paperhanging joked that they were in a committed relationship with wallpaper rolls.
meanings.sent4: She hired a paperhanging to bring a touch of creativity to her home decor.
meanings.sent5: The paperhanging's expertise in choosing the right wallpaper patterns impressed everyone.
